ICIGHAN
BIBILO
I TAR U HE
MATEU-MPASE
“Kpa se mba keghen usha mba hev man
tar u he er a tende zwa nahan, man ka
ken a ve perapera una tema ye.”
I gber Icighan Bibilo i Tar u
He ne ken ij ˆo la cii, kohol ka:
Takeda ne ka u teen a tee
ga. I gber u sha u eren tom
u tesen ior Bibilo sha tar cii,
u Mbashiada mba Yehova
ve eren la.
Icighan Bibilo i Tar u
He—Mateu-Mpase
A ˆONDO yange mgbegha ior nger Icighan Ruamabera ken zwa Hebe-
ru man zwa Aram man zwa Grika. Gba u saa a gema Ruamabera ken
ij ˆo kpishi ve ior mba ken “akuraior cii” vea ˆor Mkaanem ma A ˆondo
vea kav ye. (Mateu 24:14) Mba yer ityakeda i ikyundu kar itiankar-
ihiar, i i hii ken Mateu zan zan Mpase la ´er “Ruamabera u Mbakristu
u ken Zwa Grika,” sha ci u yange i hii ngeren i ken zwa Grika sha
uwegh ku Mbakristu mba A ˆondo ˆor ve akaa ve nger sha ayange a
mbaapostoli la.
Yange i hii duen a Icighan Bibilo i Tar u He—Mateu-Mpase la ken zwa
Buter, ken inyom i 1950. Bibilo i yange i hemba nengen ker geman
ngin y ˆo, lu i ken zwa Grika _i ior kpishi ve fe _i, i yilan ´er Westcott and
Hort, _i _i lu kwaghm ˆom a ngeren mba Icighan Ruamabera mba he-
mban tsan cii, mba yange i nger sha ave ken zwa Grika la. I n ˆongo
tsung i gema Icighan Bibilo i Tar u He, i ken zwa Buter la sha mkaa-
nem ma i nger ken zwa Grika la gedee. Gema ka _i ken zwa Buter i
yange i gber ken inyom i 2013 la i nenge ker i gem _i ken zwa Tiv ne
ye, shi _i kpa i n ˆongo tsung i gema ka kwagh u i nger ken _i ken zwa
Buter la gedee, kwagh kaha sha mi ga.
Iti i A ˆondo, i i lu un tswen a ye, i yilan ´er Yehova la, due ajiir 241 ken
Icighan Bibilo i Tar u He—Mateu-Mpase ne. Er i gbe hange hange u
a tsegha iti i A ˆondo shi i gbe u saa hanma or a yilan sha iti na ve a
yima nan y ˆo, i hide a iti i Yehova la i wa sha ajiir a i gbe u ia lu
ken Icighan Ruamabera la vough vough, ken Bibilo ne.—Mateu 6:9;
Mbaromanu 10:13.
Iti i Ichighan Bibilo i Tar u He la har sha ityendezwa i A ˆondo sha
kwagh u tar u he u mbaperapera, u una va a mi sha ci u iwasen i
uumace cii la. (2 Peteru 3:13) Mba ve er tom u geman Bibilo ne la
ka ior mba A ˆondo, u a nger Icighan Ruamabera la, a doo ve ishima
y ˆo.Ve nenge ´er gba u vea er Un icighan tom u geman mbamhen nav
kua mkaanem nam ken zwa ugen vough er i gbe u a lu la, sha afa-
ty ˆo ve cii. Se mba a vangerti ˆor ser Bibilo ne ia lu a iwasen kpishi
hen mba ˆoron _i sha gbashima, mba ve lu n ˆongon kpoghuloo sha u
vea “zua a mfe u mimi u vough” la.—1 Timoteu 2:4.

Agbaga. Ka nomsoor shin kwase u nan
yaven a ior mba nan vese ga y ˆo, he-
mban cii je y ˆo, sha u zuan a inya-
regh. (Ka ishember i ken zwa Grika i i
yer ´er porne la i gem ´er “agbaga” ye,
man inja i i ´er “u teen kwagh.”) Mba he-
mbe yilan kwase sha iti ne, nahan kpa,
mbaagbaga mba nomso kpa i ter ve
ken Bibilo. Atindi a Mose yange venda
gbaga u eren, shi yange agbaga nan _a
va er iyua ken icighanjiir u Yehova sha
inyaregh ki nan zough a mi sha gbaga u
eren la kpa i venda, kpa utempel mba
i civir akombo ker la gema lu a mba-
agbaga mba i zuan a inyaregh sha a
ve y ˆo. (Dut 23:17, 18; 1Ut 14:24) Bibilo
shi ter ishember ne sha injakwagh kpaa,
sha u ˆoron kwagh u nongoior shin akura-
ior shin mbamzough mba civir ieev, mba
ve senge ´er ve mba mbacivir A ˆondo y ˆo.
U tesen ikyav y ˆo, i ˆor kwagh u mzough u
ukwagha ˆondo u i yilan ´er “Zegebabilon”
la ken Mpase ´er ka agbagakwase, sha ci
u ka a lu vea mbahemenev mba tar ne
kangenaa sha u keren tahav man inya-
regh.—Mp 17:1-5; 18:3; 1Kr 5:25.
Agbe. Kwagh u yange i wa or ´er nana lu
ijiir i m ˆom, sha u tsahan nan y ˆo. Agbe
agen yange i wa or angahar ker tseegh.
Agen di yange _a wa or y ˆo, nan g ˆovur,
sha ci u shighe gen i zom nan angahar
man ave kua mon cii i wa ker.—Yer 20:2;
Aer 16:24.

Akombo. Ka jighjigh u ior ve ne ´er oruma-
ce ka nan _a kpe y ˆo, jijingi u nan a kpe ga,
i lu iyol i nan tseegh, shi ujijingi mba

je y ˆo sha ikyev i or (orkpehenishor) u
nan lu a az ˆov la. Ishember i ken zwa Gri-

IYIAGH KI I HII SUNDAN Y ˆO–KON U YUAN
Iyiagh ki i hii sundan y ˆo. Iyiagh ki ki via

—Nenge KON U MANDEN OR SHA MI.
Kon u manden or sha mi. Ka ishe-
mber i ken zwa Grika i i yer ´er stau-
ros la i gem _i nahan ye, inja i ishember
shon ´er, ity ˆogh ki nel ˆo ˆo ki i tim sha y ˆo,
imba i yange i mande Yesu sha mi la.
Ikyav i m ˆom ts ˆo tese ´er inja i ishember i
ken zwa Grika ne ka terankon (kon u i
t ˆo ˆo ugen i peregh sha mi), imba i mba-
fan A ˆondo ga yange ve civir akombo a
mi anyom uderi im ˆongo cii man shighe
u Kristu la ga. Ishember i “kon u ma-
nden or sha mi” la hemba pasen kwagh
u ishember i ken zwa Grika ne i lu ˆoron
la jighilii, gadia yange i ter ishember i
stauros la sha kwagh u mtev u sha ican
man ican i yan kua ihyeen i mbadondon
Yesu vea tagher a mi y ˆo. (Mt 16:24; Heb
12:2)—Nenge KON.
Kon u uma. Ka kon ugen ken sule u Eden.
Bibilo tese ´er kon ne yange u lu a akaa
a wasen or u lun uma ken ityamegh ki
u ga; kpa u tile sha ityough ki ibumun
i A ˆondo a er sha u or a zua a uma u
ts ˆoron u una na mba i lumun ve u yan
ityamegh ki u la. I ter ishember ne sha
injakwagh ken takeda u Mpase u tesen
kwagh u A ˆondo a er sha ci u ior v _e za he-
men u lun uma y ˆo.—Ge 2:9; 3:22; Mp
2:7; 22:19.

Kwagh ˆoron u profeti. Ka loho u A ˆondo a

Kwagh u veren ikyav. Yange i cagh ikyav
a mi (hemban je y ˆo, sha inyatyuu shin

Yange a tese or u kwagh, shin a tese ´er

er iceghzwa sha kwagh, shi a yange or
u nzughul a ngeren shin akaa agen a i
cagh ikyav sha mi y ˆo, er ihinda shin iwar
i mbakpenev nahan. Yange i eren akav a
sha ayange a ngise la sha akaa a ta-
ver iyol gbang gbang (er iwen shin anyi
a nortar shin kon nahan), i k ˆombo asa-
ngaabaacaa shin ikyav _i kwagh sha mi,
sha gbenda u a cagh ve a due er i soo la
y ˆo. Ka i er tom a ikyav sha injakwagh
sha u tesen kwagh u i nenge ´er ka u
mimi y ˆo, shin sha u tesen ´er kwagh ka u

kwaghmyer y ˆo.—Mt 27:66; Yh 6:27; Ef

Gba u Mbakristu vea h ˆoron kwaghyan
keng ga.—Ese 8:21; Yes 58:6; Mt 4:2;
9:14; Lu 18:12; Aer 13:2, 3; 27:9.
Kwaghyan u Ter u Aikighe. Ka kwaghyan
kp ˆo ˆo kp ˆo ˆo, beredi u i we kwa sha mi ga
y ˆo, kua wain; ka ku-umbur u Yesu. Bere-
di la tile sha ityough ki iyol i Kristu, wain
la di tile sha ityough ki awambe a na. Er
Ruamabera a kaa ´er Mbakristu ve eren

Kwa. Ka kwagh u ka i wa sha mwem ma
h ˆoron shin sha zar kwagh sha u v _e ange

ORKURAN–OR U NAN LU KPAN GA; OR U NAN DUE KEN KPAN KERA
Ashighe kpishi mbakuran yange ve tile
sha girgar sha ajiir kposo kposo kua sha
ayou a taven g ˆog ˆonan, sha u vea nenge
a ior mba ve lu van la ken ica, cii man
vea va zurum ye. Orkuran u ken shoja
y ˆo, ka i yila nan ´er orshoja u kuran.—Mt
27:65; 28:4.
Orkuran. Nomsoor u tom u nan jim jim i
lu u nengen sha ti ˆonnongo shi kuran un
y ˆo. Ka ishember i ken zwa Grika i i yer ´er
episkopos la i gem nahan ye, man inja i
ishember shon jighilii y ˆo ´er, u nengen
sha kwagh sha u kuran un. Ishember i
“orkuran” man i “ortamen” (presbyteros)
la cii ka asember a a lu ˆoron kwagh u
iantom i m ˆom ken ti ˆonnongo u Kristu y ˆo.
Ishember i “ortamen” la ngi tesen aeren
a organden a or u i ver nan sha iantom la
nan lu a mi y ˆo; i “orkuran” la di ngi pa-
sen ityom i nan lu a mi sha iantom ne la.
—Aer 20:28; 1Ti 3:2-7; 1Pe 5:2.
Ormaantyegh. Or u maan mtem ma
inyaav man agbande a inyaav kua mkam
ma inyaav magen. Ishember i ken zwa
Heberu i i gem
´er ormaantyegh la,
inja na jighilii y ˆo ´er, “or u maan akaa.”
Ashighe kpishi ka i t ˆo ˆo tahav mbu
ormaantyegh nan lu a mi sha inyatyuu
la, i tese ikyav er Yehova a lu a tahav
sha ior asange asange man akuraior y ˆo.
—Yes 64:8; Ro 9:21.
Ornasareti. Iti i i yilan Yesu a mi y ˆo, sha
ci u lu or u ken gar u Nasareti. A shi
nan kpa iti ne zua vea ishember i ken

“gbaa” la. Mbadondon Yesu kpa yange i

Orshiren Ti ˆonnongo. Ka ishember i ken
zwa Grika i i yer ´er diakonos la i gem _i
nahan ye. Ashighe kpishi ka i gema _i ´er
“orshiren ior” shin “or u eren ior tom.”
Ishember i “orshiren ti ˆonnongo” la ngi
ˆoron kwagh u or u nan wasen mzough u
mbatamen tom ken ti ˆonnongo y ˆo. Saa
nana eren akaa a Bibilo _i tese ´er mba ve
lu sha iantom ne v _e eren la ve, nana
kuma sha i ye.—1Ti 3:8-10, 12.
Ortamen; Tamenor. Ka organden, kpa
ken Ruamabera y ˆo, ka or u nan lu sha
ma ian i utaha man iantom hen ity ˆo shin
ma tar y ˆo. I yila mbatyomov mba shaav
kpa sha iti ne ken takeda u Mpase. Ishe-

ros la, ka i gema _i ´er “ortamen,” zum u i
lu ˆoron kwagh u or u nan lu sha iantom
i hemen ken ti ˆonnongo la y ˆo.—Ek 4:29;
Anz 31:23; 1Ti 5:17; Mp 4:4.

Ruamabera u ken Zwa Heberu u tse hi-

ne. Yange ve hendan a Yesu.—Ese 7:6;

Ortyom u Tamen. Inja na y ˆo ´er “orvesen u
mbatyomov.” Kwagh ne tese ´er “ortyom
u tamen” ngu m ˆom tseegh. Shi ken Bibi-

kwagh u or m ˆom, kwagh ne kpa tese ´er

ˆor ´er iti i ortyom u tamen la ka Mikael.
—Da 12:1; Yu 9; Mp 12:7.
Or u eren tom ken ya u tor. Inja na jighi-
lii y ˆo ´er, nomsoor u i dugh nan ake y ˆo.
Ashighe kpishi yange i na ambaaior la
tom ken uya mba utor, ve wasen shin
ve nengen sha torkwase man kasev mba
sha uikya. Shi or u i dugh nan ake ga
kpa, yange _a wa nan ityom i eren ken
ya u tor y ˆo, i yila nan nahan. Shi i er
tom a ishember ne sha injakwagh u ˆoron
kwagh u or u nan ‘tsua u v ˆoson kwase

i nan tsaha sha er nana hemba zuan a
ian i eren tom u A ˆondo hanma shighe je
la.—Mt 19:12; Es 2:15; Aer 8:27.
Or u nan lu kpan ga; Or u nan due ken

TARTARU–U GBIDYEN IYIAV; VANDE U GBIDYEN IYIAV
Tartaru. Ken Ruamabera u Mbakristu u
ken Zwa Grika la, ishember ne ngi ˆoron
kwagh u mlu u gban ijime, er ken purusu
nahan, u yange i kende mbatyomov mba
sha ayange a Noa la ker y ˆo. Ishember i
pasen ieren i i ter ken 2 Peteru 2:4, i
yer ´er tartaroo (i i gem ´er, u “kenden
ken Tartaru”) la, ngi tesen ´er yange i ke-
nde “mbatyomov mba ve er isholibo la”
ken Tartaru u i er kwagh na ken kwagh-
al ˆom la ga. (Kwaghal ˆom shon pase ´er
ijiir ne ka purusu u shin inya, shi ka ijiir
i ang ˆoghime i kenden mbaa ˆondo mba
gban ijime shimi). Kpa ngi tesen ´er A ˆo-
ndo yange dugh ve sha ajiir a ve kua
ityom i ve lu sha mi la kera, gema ke-
nde ve ken mlu u gban ijime, nahan kera
mba ken iwanger i mbaawashima mba
A ˆondo la ga. Ime la tese kwagh u una er
ve y ˆo, Ruamabera tese ´er mtim u ts ˆoron
ngu keghen ve kua orhemen ve Satan
Diabolo. Sha nahan y ˆo, Tartaru ngu te-
sen ijiir i hemban gban ijime cii i i ver
sha ci u mbatyomov mba yange ve he-
mba ato la y ˆo. Ijiir ne ngi kwaghm ˆom a
“ihyungwa i i ze kweng” i i ˆor kwagh u i
ken Mpase 20:1-3 la ga.
Tartor u A ˆondo. Ka _a ter ishember ne y ˆo, i
lu kwagh u gomoti u Wan u A ˆondo, Kris-

Tembe. Lu ikyasen i tabernakel i yange i
wa _i igyar i ningir i tser y ˆo. Ken maseji-

i tempel, a kpekpe u yange kase tem-
pel la wa a at ˆo y ˆo. Yange atse a na-
nden nagh lu hen tembe u tabernakel.
Ken tempel y ˆo, atse la lu hen tembe u
ken at ˆo la. Bibilo shi ˆor kwagh u ityembe
i uya mba iorov man i ikwa i utor kpaa.
—Ek 8:13; 27:9; 1Ut 7:12; Mt 26:3; Mr

Uma. Ka ishember i i yer _i ken zwa Heberu
´er nephesh, ken zwa Grika di i yer ´er

igen kposo, kpa Bibilo tese ´er ishember i

u lun a iyol, u i benden a mi shi i ne-

y ˆo, asember a ken ij ˆo i yange i hii nge-

er kwagh u i lu ˆoron la a tese la, sha

a a til sha ityough ki iti i or y ˆo, (u te-
sen ikyav y ˆo, ka i nger “mo” shin “m,”
hen ape ma i nger ´er “uma wam” y ˆo).
Ashighe kpishi ka a gema ishember ne
nahan y ˆo, i gema shin ngeren mba shin
kpe ´er “uma.” Zum u i ˆor kwagh i ter
ishember i “uma” la y ˆo, _a lu ken ngeren u
Bibilo gay ˆo ngeren u shin kpe kpa, gba u
a kav inja i _i er i pase sha heen nahan.
Zum u i lu ˆoron kwagh u or eren ma
kwagh a uma u nan cii y ˆo, mba kaan ´er
ka u or eren kwagh shon a mlu u nan cii,
shin a ishima i nan i m ˆom, shin ken uma
u nan cii. (Dut 6:5; Mt 22:37) A faty ˆo u
teren asember a ken ij ˆo i yange i hii nge-
ren Bibilo ker ne sha ajiir agen, zum u i
lu ˆoron kwagh u isharen _i ma kwaghuma
y ˆo. Shi a faty ˆo u teren asember ne sha u
ˆoron kwagh u orkpen shin ikyom i or-
kpen.—Nu 6:6; Anz 23:2; Yes 56:11; Hag
2:13.
